meanings.definition: Unable to be repaired or fixed.
meanings.sent2: The irreparableness of the shattered vase was evident.
meanings.sent3: The irreparableness of the leaky roof made the situation comical.
meanings.sent4: The irreparableness of their friendship was like a bridge burned down.
meanings.sent5: The irreparableness of the torn painting left the artist devastated.

meanings.definition: The state of being beyond repair.
meanings.sent1: The irreparableness of the situation left them hopeless.
meanings.sent2: The irreparableness of the damage was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The irreparableness of the cake after the dog got to it was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: The irreparableness of the rift between them felt like a chasm.
meanings.sent5: The irreparableness of the old building was a reminder of time's passage.
